p: Manuka oil sample pre-registered by the ECHA (EC Number: 434-370-3) was found to have LD 50: 1.061 mg/kg body weight (95% CI: 722â€“1.557) for oral administration and LD50 >2000 mg/kg body weight. Low scores for erythema and edema were determined for skin irritation and eye irritation tests in vivo.
